sections.title: What is YASS?
sections.content: YASS is a suite of libraries designed to make FRC programming faster and easier. It includes tools for swerve drive, mechanism control, and code generation.

sections.title: YAGSL (Swerve)
sections.content: Yet Another General Swerve Library simplifies swerve drive implementation. Instead of writing complex kinematics code, you configure your motors and encoders in JSON files. YAGSL handles the math, odometry, and simulation integration for you.

sections.title: YAMG (Generator)
sections.content: Yet Another Mechanism Generator is a web tool that generates Java code for mechanisms. You visually configure your elevator or arm (gear ratios, motor types), and it produces ready-to-use Command-Based subsystem code.
